channel.title: Pleaase read and try to help
channel.description:
Hello readers, I seem to have a very minor problem. I'm not sure if these are "stupid" questions, if they are please do not post an insult or anything like that. Firstly, all pictures are in the attachments: On my server, the godswords hit horribly until I raised the "slash" bonus to 300, (Armadyl Godsword). but they still aren't hitting the usual like in other servers, i'm sure the bonuses in serverss like 2Speced are like 100. Why is it like this? I'm on the "PwnScape" source. (The rune c'bow in 2speced is 7 bonus and mines is 400....that only hits around 20...) Do I have to add a hidden bonus or somehow make it appear less? if so, how?
Next my stand animation for the godswords [refer to picture, attachment] look like this. I have read the tutorials and they set the godsword stance a different way, I did it exactly and it still looks like that. The run animation is how it should be. and also look at the attack animation, I haven't the slightest how to change it [attachment] Thank you.
Please try to help :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2009, 04:10:36 pm[/size][hr]Attachment below[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2009, 05:31:12 pm[/size][hr]somebody help!

item.title: Pleaase read and try to help
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

you dont need to change any bonus in the items.cfg because its a custom item, try looking for something like
calc(maxhit.20) something like that

Read full topic
item.source: Pleaase read and try to help

item.title: Pleaase read and try to help
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

well if you want the ags to hit higher then you need to increase the str bonus of it… and with the godsword stance you can find a source that has it and copy them into yours.

Read full topic
item.source: Pleaase read and try to help

item.title: Pleaase read and try to help
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hello readers, I seem to have a very minor problem.
I’m not sure if these are “stupid” questions, if they are please do not post an insult or anything like that.
Firstly, all pictures are in the attachments:
On my server, the godswords hit horribly until I raised the “slash” bonus to 300, (Armadyl Godsword). but they still aren’t hitting the usual like in other servers, i’m sure the bonuses in serverss like 2Speced are like 100.
Why is it like this? I’m on the “PwnScape” source.
(The rune c’bow in 2speced is 7 bonus and mines is 400…that only hits around 20…)
Do I have to add a hidden bonus or somehow make it appear less? if so, how?

Next my stand animation for the godswords [refer to picture, attachment] look like this.
I have read the tutorials and they set the godsword stance a different way, I did it exactly and it still looks like that. The run animation is how it should be.
and also look at the attack animation, I haven’t the slightest how to change it [attachment]
Thank you.

Please try to help [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2009, 04:10:36 pm[/size][hr]Attachment below[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2009, 05:31:12 pm[/size][hr]somebody help!

Read full topic
